Trustee_16.name: Robert Miller
Trustee_16.content: The rejection of my allocation plan by Sergey Petrov has further impacted my reputation in the investment community. This incident not only reflects ongoing concerns regarding the equity of my proposed plans but also confirms my continued struggle to gain trust from potential investors. With my very low acceptance rate from investors, I recognize the urgent need to revise my approaches for proposing fair and transparent allocation plans to facilitate successful partnerships in the future. My ability to present a balanced and fair proposal is crucial for rebuilding my reputation.
